FOCUS_MODE_TUNER
   focus_filter0:                0  0  0  0 -1 -1  4 -1 -1  0  0  0  0  # reasonable/good light
   focus_filter1:                0  0 -1 -1 -1  2  2  2 -1 -1 -1  0  0  # low light

   ev_threshold:                 0        # use filter_lowlight_threshold instead
   fast_af_mode:                 0        # will use af_exposure instead
   minimum_speedup:              282      # don't change frame rate unless achieve at least this speedup
   exp_tolerance:                269      # when waiting for camera exposure to speed up, camera may not exactly deliver the desired exposure - this is the tolerance to use
   frame_drop_diff:              77       # controls dropping of alternate frames when running at faster frame rate (drop frames when (2-0.3)x speedup or more is achieved)
   filter_threshold:             0        # use filter_threshold_func
   ref_ag:                       1024     # filer_threshold_func calibrated at ag=4.0
   filter_lowlight_threshold:    0        # brightness below which low light filter coefficients are used
   fixed_focus_threshold:        0        # brightness below which fixed focus position is used
   coarse_only_threshold:        0        # brightness below which only coarse search is done
   coarse_fixed_focus_threshold: 0        # xxxx ?
   start_failure_tol:           1.03     # xxxx ?
   end_failure_tol:             1.03     # xxxx ?
   near_peak_descriminator:      0        # xxxx ?
   prefer_macro_factor:          0        # xxxx ?
   face_reduce_factor:           0        # don't shrink face windows (not applicable since face priority off)
   #af_assist_colour:             RED      # colour of AF assist lamp (xxxx doc say this is in modeless, but code says otherwise)

	FOCUS_STATS_PREPROC_AF
      enable: TRUE
      h_subsample: 2000 0.0 0.0 # g_average_normalised > 1st val ? no subsample : (> 2nd ? subsample x2 : (> 3rd ? x4 : x8))
      v_subsample: 2000 0.0 0.0
      threshold_func:
         0.0  7
         1999 7 # switch from 7 to 20 once we're not subsampling
         2000 20
         1.0  14
         2.0  0 # require bright images to be reasonably contrasty (to avoid locking on clear blue sky)
         *
      sw_reliability_threshold_func:
         0.0   28.0
         100   40.0    # make it a little more likely to succeed in low light
         300   1000.0
         1999  1000.0
         2000  400.0   # sudden jump because of switch to subsampling
         255.0 400.0
         *
      iir_feedback: 0
	END

FOCUS_MODELESS_TUNER

   hyperfocal_position:          220
   front_cam_fixed_focus_position:  140
   lens_reset_period:            -1       # disabled as lens driver can't do anything useful to reset the position
   af_assist_threshold:          0        # never use AF assist lamp
   face_update_always:           0        # do not update face metadata and positions each frame
   af_assist_canonical_exposure: 45000    # (not used because af_assist_threshold=0)
   face_priority_enable:         FALSE
   early_termination:            100      # abandon the coarse or fine search if current FOM is less than this times the best FOM seen so far
   use_max_fom_contribution:     TRUE     # whether to use the max subregion contribution to compare against fom_contribution    (not relevant since only one region)
   af_lock_threshold:            0        # af_lock_threshold_func used instead
   maf_peak_threshold:           0        # xxxx
   want_handover:                0        # use CAF position as starting point for fine search
   af_use_face_box:              0        # use face box size as starting point for fine search
   af_assist_device:             0        # presumably only one device
   lens_step_factor:             256      # trust the lens driver's estimate of worst case movement time
   fom_decrease_threshold:       0        # don't adjust AF search step using relative size of FOMs
   fom_decrease_step_factor:     0        # not used because fom_decrease_threshold=0
   af_window_factor:             256      # xxxx?
   move_lens_during_exp:         TRUE     # xxxx good values for lens_step_factor and af_window_factor?
   interpolate_coarse:           500      # skews the result of finding the best (interpolated) search position from the coarse search
   interpolate_fine:             500      # as interpolate_coarse but for fine
   fine_truncate:                CONTINUE # if fine search truncated, continue
   fine_truncate_speedup:        0        # xxxx?
   percent_pix_max_fom:          0        # don't ignore regions based on number of pixels contribution to FOM (presumably not applicable anyway because only using one region?)

   # Use fine step which is 1/3 of coarse step
   fine_search_step_ratio: 84

   # Use this many fine steps
   fine_search_num_steps: 4

   # Gives a minimum response value of the focus filters (per pixel) before we cease to trust them
   sw_reliability_threshold: 1792
   aec_enable:    TRUE
   aec_exp_reduce:
      64 256
      128 90
      160 51
      200 32
       *
   aec_threshold:    179

   #   aec_enable: TRUE
   #   aec_exp_reduce:
   #      64  1.0
   #      128 0.7
   #      160 0.5
   #      200 0.3
   #      *
   #   aec_threshold: 0.8
   # maximum allowable frames to be used for AE
   max_aec_frames:   8

   #step sizes for coarse and fine searches
   coarse_step:
      0 23
      50 23
      130 32
      175 52
      255 52
       *
   fine_step:
      0 29
      50 22
      130 17
      175 9
      255 8
       *

   # brightness -> minimum % of pixels within AF window that must contribute to FOM for AF to succeed
   fom_contribution:
      0 655
      66 1311
      2621 1966
      6554 2621
      65536 2621
       *

   # use all regions irrespective of number of pixels contributing to FOM (since we have only one region)
   fom_contribution_threshold:
      0 0
      65536 0
       *

   # brightness -> factor by which the max FOX must exceed the min FOM for the AF cycle to succeed
   af_lock_threshold_func:
      0 307
      131 307
      655 320
      1311 320
       *


   #REGIONS
   STATISTICS
      n: 1
      REGION 0
         x_offset:          28836
         y_offset:          28836
         width:             7864
         height:            13107
         weight:            8
         mask: 1
      END
   END


   #MODES

      af_assist_intensity:   28
   END


   # includes fine search

   # XXXX
   CF_THRESH
      deltafom_enable: FALSE
      bestfom_enable: TRUE
      deltagrn_enable: FALSE
      saturation_enable: TRUE

      bestfom:    0.6 # default
      deltafom:   12
      deltagrn:   5
      saturation: 0.65
      lowlight:   50 # default (set to 100000 to disable CAF)
      dfom_rate:  10 #256
      bst_rate: 10
      dgrn_rate: 250

     ##
      ## AUTO DELTA GREEN
      ##
      auto_dgrn_enable: FALSE # enable for auto delta green trigger
      auto_dgrn_frames: 4        # the number of frames we have to be over threshold before the trigger fires
      auto_dgrn_win_size: 10     # the length of the window used to calculate stddev and mean
      auto_dgrn_win_lag: 10       # the number of frames the window lags behind the current frame (I wonder if this should be same as auto_dgrn_frames)

    # Method 1 - Tomer
      auto_dgrn_proportion: 26
      min_delta_grn: 1536

    # Method 2 - Mark
      auto_dgrn_use_stddev: TRUE   # set to TRUE to use stddev method, the parameters below apply:
      auto_dgrn_stddev_scale: 2.0  # the scaling of standard deviation before it is added to / subtracted from the mean, to give the upper / lower threshold
      # standard deviation isn't allowed to go below this
      auto_dgrn_rate: 255

      ##
      ## AUTO DELTA FOM
      ##
      auto_dfom_enable: FALSE     # enable for auto delta green trigger
      auto_dfom_frames: 5       # the number of frames we have to be over threshold before the trigger fires
      auto_dfom_win_size: 10     # the length of the window used to calculate stddev and mean
      auto_dfom_win_lag: 10       # the number of frames the window lags behind the current frame (I wonder if this should be same as auto_dgrn_frames)

   # Method 1 - Tomer
      auto_dfom_proportion: 26
      min_delta_fom: 1536 #Bad

      # Method 2 - Mark
      auto_dfom_use_stddev: TRUE    # set to TRUE to use stddev method, the parameters below apply:
      auto_dfom_stddev_scale: 2.0   # the scaling of standard deviation before it is added to / subtracted from the mean, to give the upper / lower threshold
      # standard deviation isn't allowed to go below this (!! not tuned)
      auto_dfom_rate: 255

      # WOI AUTO DELTA FOM
      vote_woi_enable: TRUE
      # not really used yet, tuning mods unlikely to affect anything
      auto_dfom_woi_min_stddev:
         0     150
         65535 150
         *
      auto_dfom_woi_stddev_scale: 0.5 # not really used yet, tuning mods unlikely to affect anything
      auto_dfom_woi_win_size: 5 # not really used yet, tuning mods unlikely to affect anything
      auto_dfom_woi_win_lag: 5 # not really used yet, tuning mods unlikely to affect anything
      auto_dfom_woi_use_stddev: TRUE  # not really used yet, tuning mods unlikely to affect anything
      auto_dfom_woi_frames: 2  # not really used yet, tuning mods unlikely to affect anything
      vote_woi_numregions: 1

      # countdowns (used for spike rejection):
      bestfom_frames: 5
      # best brightness to be added later.
   END

   ## detection for preview mode
   CF_THRESH_FAST
      deltafom_enable: FALSE
      bestfom_enable: TRUE
      deltagrn_enable: FALSE
      saturation_enable: TRUE

      bestfom:    0.6 # default
      deltafom:   12
      deltagrn:   5
      saturation: 0.65
      lowlight:   50 # default (set to 100000 to disable CAF)
      dfom_rate:  10 #256
      bst_rate: 10
      dgrn_rate: 250

      ##
      ## AUTO DELTA GREEN
      ##
      auto_dgrn_enable: FALSE     # enable for auto delta green trigger
      auto_dgrn_frames: 2        # make this twitch more in preview
      auto_dgrn_win_size: 10     # the length of the window used to calculate stddev and mean
      auto_dgrn_win_lag: 10       # the number of frames the window lags behind the current frame (I wonder if this should be same as auto_dgrn_frames)

   # Method 1 - Tomer
      auto_dgrn_proportion: 26
      min_delta_grn: 1536

      # Method 2 - Mark
      auto_dgrn_use_stddev: TRUE  # set to TRUE to use stddev method, the parameters below apply:
      auto_dgrn_stddev_scale: 2.0  # the scaling of standard deviation before it is added to / subtracted from the mean, to give the upper / lower threshold
      # standard deviation isn't allowed to go below this
      auto_dgrn_rate: 255

      ##
      ## AUTO DELTA FOM
      ##
      auto_dfom_enable: FALSE     # enable for auto delta green trigger
      auto_dfom_frames: 2       # the number of frames we have to be over threshold before the trigger fires
      auto_dfom_win_size: 10     # the length of the window used to calculate stddev and mean
      auto_dfom_win_lag: 10       # the number of frames the window lags behind the current frame (I wonder if this should be same as auto_dgrn_frames)

      # Method 1 - Tomer
      auto_dfom_proportion: 26
      min_delta_fom: 1536 #Bad

      # Method 2 - Mark
      auto_dfom_use_stddev: TRUE    # set to TRUE to use stddev method, the parameters below apply:
      auto_dfom_stddev_scale: 2.0   # the scaling of standard deviation before it is added to / subtracted from the mean, to give the upper / lower threshold
      # standard deviation isn't allowed to go below this (!! not tuned)
      auto_dfom_rate: 255

      # WOI AUTO DELTA FOM
      vote_woi_enable: TRUE
      # not really used yet, tuning mods unlikely to affect anything
      auto_dfom_woi_min_stddev:
         0     150
         65535 150
         *
      auto_dfom_woi_stddev_scale: 0.5 # not really used yet, tuning mods unlikely to affect anything
      auto_dfom_woi_win_size: 5 # not really used yet, tuning mods unlikely to affect anything
      auto_dfom_woi_win_lag: 5 # not really used yet, tuning mods unlikely to affect anything
      auto_dfom_woi_use_stddev:	TRUE  # not really used yet, tuning mods unlikely to affect anything
      auto_dfom_woi_frames: 2  # not really used yet, tuning mods unlikely to affect anything
      vote_woi_numregions: 1

      # countdowns (used for spike rejection):
      bestfom_frames: 5
      # best brightness to be added later.
   END

   cf_init_position: 175  # this may be overwritten before it does anything

   CF_SEARCH_DEFAULT
      search_step:
      0           9
      180         7
      255         7
      *
      search_confidence: 20 #
      search_low_fom_thresh: 293 # x256. Below this level we don't trust FOMs to give a good search direction
      search_go_middle_low: 55 # below this focus position we're more likely to head to the middle
      search_go_middle_high: 189 # above this focus position we're more likely to head to the end

      wait_time:            250 # Time in ms spent waiting after scene change is detected before beginning search

     caf_step:
      0           10
      50          13
      130         17
      175         17
      200         10
      255         10
      *

      hill_tol_func:
         0    17
         100  17
         500  20 # is it reasonable to expect steeper hills under bright conditions? log 67
         4178 20
         *
      max_return_step_size: 2       # number of positions which can be moved per-frame when in CF_MOVE_TO_DONE state
      max_failed_step_size: 15
      use_face_info:        0        # don't use face info since not tuned

      min_fom_hysteresis_func:
      0     1600
      75    1600  # 4 Lux
      110   4000  # 7 Lux
      235   42000 # 15 Lux
      328   84500 # 20 Lux
      690   168000 # 43 Lux
      *

      min_fom_hysteresis: 100000 # deprecated
      bottom_end: 1
      top_end: 217
      done_wait_frames: 3

      single_dir: TRUE
      single_dir_go_up: 128
      limit_search_step: TRUE

      # These control the restarting of a search if a large change in scene brightness is detected
      restart_search_proportion:   0.15      # we restart if the change in green from frame n to frame n+1 is larger than this proportion of frame n's green
      restart_search_min_thresh_func: # not tuned between 0 and 100 yet
      0    20
      100  400
      256  400
      *
      restart_search_min_thresh:   400       # (but we don't allow the threshold to go below this value)
      restart_search_drop_frames:  5        # The number of frames we drop before starting to search again.
      restart_search_max_restarts: 10        # The maximum number of times we restart a search before abandoning it
	  default_position: 220 # same as hyperfocal in AF
   END
